CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if TriggerBodyEntity == _UserService.LocalPlayer then TriggerBodyEntity.TriggerComponent.Enable = false TriggerBodyEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("DEAD")
wait(3) _TeleportService:TeleportToEntityPath(TriggerBodyEntity,"/maps/술래잡기_LV1/SpawnLocation") TriggerBodyEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("IDLE") TriggerBodyEntity.TriggerComponent.Enable = true end
